JPO Tak Beratap di Sudirman Disoal, PKS: Buat Nyebrang, Bukan Buat Neduh
06 Nov 2019, 08:33 by Zunita Putri
Jakarta - Wakil Ketua DPRD dari F-PKS Abdurrahman Suhaimi menyebut pernyataan pengamat tata kota salah kaprah terkait pernyataan JPO tak beratap karena tak bisa digunakan berteduh saat hujan itu tidaklah tepat. Sebab, menurutnya, JPO itu fungsinya bukan sebagai tempat berteduh, melainkan hanya berfungsi sebagai alat bantu menyeberang bagi pejalan kaki.
"Ya masukan-masukan didengar saja, sebagai bahan masukan. Kalau kehujanan kan pakai payung, kan kalau keluar itu ke JPO pakai payung nggak kalau hujan? Iya, iya kan," kata Suhaimi saat dihubungi, Selasa (6/11/2019) malam.
Dia pun mencontohkan underpass yang kerap menjadi tempat berteduh untuk para pengendara motor. Dia mengatakan masyarakat jeli mengenai fungsi fasilitas umum seperti JPO dan underpass.
"JPO untuk neduh, fungsinya apa bukan? Seperti misalnya gini, underpass kalau musim hujan buat neduh, itu tempat meneduh apa bukan? Fungsinya neduh apa bukan? Akhirnya kan macet banget kan buat neduh, ya seperti itu," katanya.
"Jadi gini, JPO buat nyebrang, bukan buat neduh. Tapi intinya fungsikan sesuatu sesuai dengan fungsinya, dan juga dijaga keindahan, dijaga kenyamanan, dijaga keamanannya," lanjutnya.

JPO Is Not Covered in Sudirman Disoal, PKS: For Crossing, Not for Shading
Nov 6 2019, 08:33 by Zunita Putri
Jakarta - Deputy Speaker of the DPRD from F-PKS Abdurrahman Suhaimi said the statement of the urban planning observer was wrong because the JPO statement was not roofed because it cannot be used as shelter when it rains was not right. Because, according to him, the JPO's function is not as a shelter, but only functions as a crossing aid for pedestrians.
"Yes, the inputs are only heard, as input material. If it is rained on, it will use an umbrella, if you go out to the JPO, will you use an umbrella if it rains? .
He also cited the underpass which is often a shelter for motorcyclists. He said the public was keen about the function of public facilities such as JPO and underpass.
"JPO is for shade, what is the function right? Like for example like this, underpasses when the rainy season is for shade, what is the shade or not? What is the function for shade or not?
"So, like this, JPO is for crossing, not for shade. But the point is to function according to its function, and also to maintain beauty, safeguarded comfort, safeguarded," he continued.
